welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bagong Pag-Asa, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourselves in our beautiful city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it mainly serves international flights for Philippine Airlines and its subsidiary PAL Express.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving mainly international flights for Cebu Pacific, Philippine Airlines, and its subsidiary PAL Express.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it now serves only domestic flights for smaller budget airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Baler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
